<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// DEFINE&#95;ABBREV - Defines an abbrev for the current block.  It consists</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of a vbr5 for # operand infos.  Each operand info is emitted with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// single bit to indicate if it is a literal encoding.  If so, the value is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// emitted with a vbr8.  If not, the encoding is emitted as 3 bits followed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// by the info value as a vbr5 if needed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitc/#ab7a76f80792b96a4291e2d1dd1403887a0353c03d98b211f15e10bad35397bf8d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitc/#ab7a76f80792b96a4291e2d1dd1403887a0353c03d98b211f15e10bad35397bf8d">DEFINE&#95;ABBREV</a> = 2,</span></CodeLine>
